metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8859 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
The send package before 0.11.1 for Node.js allows attackers to obtain the root path via unspecified vectors.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2015-8859` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-send - 0.16.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-send package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.16.2-1').
